desc: Porchlight Presents is a passion project started by two friends Luka and Matt who met at a birthday party and immediately bonded over their shared dream of starting a music venue. It’s a combining of sorts of their respective projects:
dpsor: Dead Poets’ School of Rock is a variety show that has been hosted at Cassette in Ridgewood, Queens, since July of 2025 — meshing acts ranging from music to drag to comedy to poetry, all in one event.
ops: On Pacific Street is a DIY live music venue hosted in a cozy living room in Brooklyn, NY, whose shows create an atmosphere that is intimate, welcoming, and vulnerable. They have been hosting shows since November 2022.
